mapper.select: select t.* from ( select rownum as seq, a.art_seq as artSeq, a.thm_seq as thmSeq, a.userid as userid , a.book_seq as bookSeq, to_char(a.posting_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as postingDate, a.read_cnt as readCnt, a.title as title, a.content as content, m.name as name from Article a join Member m on a.userid = m.userid and a.userid = #{searchVal} and a.thm_seq = #{theme} ) t where seq between #{start} and #{end} order by artSeq desc

select art_seq as artSeq, thm_seq as thmSeq, userid as userid , book_seq as bookSeq, posting_date as postingDate, read_cnt as readCnt, title as title, content as content from (select rownum as seq, a.* from Article a) where seq between #{start} and #{end} order by artSeq desc
